name: 2D Shooter Final (gerlac32)
description:
Soren Gerlach's 2D Shooter Final Project

Modifications:

1. I Re-did level 1 and added in levels 2 & 3. Each level is unique.

2. I created a Boss enemy who has the same design as the straight shooters and moves like the chasers, but is larger, has more help, shoots faster, and is worth more points.

3. I added in two power-ups, one makes the player faster and the other causes the player to shoot faster.

Created by Soren Gerlach
